concept.title: Draw rectangles and squares
concept.shortdesc: Square and rectangle are drawn via different tools, although they book create 'rect' elements on the SVG.

section.p: Use the Square tool when you want an equal sided rect. Use the Rectangle tool otherwise.

ol.li: Select the Rectangle tool or the Square tool

Do one of the following
Move your mouse to where you want one of the corners of the rectangle to be, then drag in any direction until the rectangle is the desired size.
Click where you want the top left corner of a new rectangle to appear with the dimensions of the last rectangle created.
